revised_title: Preliminary Comparison of Kew and Stonyhurst Declination Magnetographs
tldr: The authors compare the declination curves of the Kew and Stonyhurst magnetographs and find that while most disturbances are similar, some differences can be attributed to local factors. They also observe that the abruptness of disturbances is generally correlated with the excess of Stonyhurst over Kew in declination disturbances.
